test-case.name: should fail when there is a requested action which is not in the rule actions
test-case.title: should fail when there is a requested action which is not in the rule actions

test-case.name: should pass when requested action is same as the rule actions
test-case.title: should pass when requested action is same as the rule actions

test-case.name: should pass when all requested action is in the rule actions
test-case.title: should pass when all requested action is in the rule actions

test-case.name: should pass when rule actions contains the all-actions sign (*)
test-case.title: should pass when rule actions contains the all-actions sign (*)

test-case.name: should fail when requested actions contains the all-actions sign (*) and the rule actions doesn't
test-case.title: should fail when requested actions contains the all-actions sign (*) and the rule actions doesn't

test-case.name: should pass when both requested actions and rule actions contains the all-actions sign (*)
test-case.title: should pass when both requested actions and rule actions contains the all-actions sign (*)
